enableOpen.description: Set whether to open automatically or not.

showOnlyLive.description: Option label to display only channels that are currently live.

openNewWindow.description: Label for the option to open in a new window.

enableTabRotation.description: Label for the option to auto-switch between multiple tabs.

enableTabMute.description: Label for the option to automatically mute inactive tabs.

enableAutoClose.description: Label for the option to automatically close offline channels.
